content: What is needed to create a new trace class? builtin_initialize Lean.registerTraceClass <backtick>IIT.Totality doesn't enable me to do set_option trace.IIT.Totality true...

@Jakob von Raumer You have to use the initialize command. I added an example
https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/commit/a29e81b0b6eb305d47c6e8675187f254bf7d2e5c
